prompt_base: raw photo, cinematic film still, portrait of a (giant Thai kickboxer:1.3), massive vertical scar, broad muscular physique, shaved head, eyepatch, stoic intimidating gaze, 8k uhd
feature_prompt: highly detailed skin pores, (realistic scar tissue texture:1.3), (weathered rugged skin:1.2), source palette preservation, identical color matching, (matching fabric texture on trunks:1.2), visible sweat, cinematic lighting, film grain
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, illustration, (3d render:1.3), (cgi:1.3), (toy:1.4), (plastic:1.3), (doll:1.3), mannequin, smooth chest, small build, (two eyes:1.4), blurry scar, low quality, friendly
